name: Dinomon
description:
I always was curious about how Pokémon created its battle systems. So I attempted to make one myself and this was the result. 

For best gameplay experience launch in full screen.

Controls:

Interact - Space/Enter

Move left - A/Left arrow

Move right - D/Right arrow

Assets:

Rock: https://opengameart.org/content/rock-0

Monsters: https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-monster-sprites-from-friendswithmonsters

Explosion: https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-3

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-6-8-bit
